channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk wants to meet Alex Soros to ‘understand his goals’ after comparing his billionaire dad George to an X-Men villain
item.description: Alex Soros replied: "I often learn most from people whose views are different than my own. Open to meeting."

item.title: Comcast stock gains on report that NBCUniversal cable networks will be spun off
Eurozone negotiated wages rose 5.42% in 3Q, versus +3.54% in 2Q
Employees are spending the equivalent of a month’s grocery bill on the return to the office–and growing more resentful than ever, survey finds
item.description: The average employee returning to the office spends $561 per month–that's the average two-person household’s grocery bill in the U.S. for the entire m...

item.title: Ex-Nomura staffer charged after attempted murder at elderly client’s home
Exclusive: Oishii, vertical farming startup, closes its Series B at $150 million
item.description: Vertical farming startup Oishii has closed its Series B at $150 million, Fortune can exclusively report.

item.title: Comcast to spin off NBCU cable TV channels
item.description: The new $7 billion company would reportedly include MSNBC, CNBC, Oxygen, E!, USA Network, Syfy, and Golf Channel.

item.title: Wall Street lowers expectations for profits in 2025. Should investors worry?
Target shares slump 20% after retailer posts big earnings miss, cuts forecast
Here’s how escalating Russia tensions could impact markets and supply chains, according to experts
item.description: The conflict could affect natural resources used in the production of semiconductors.
